document_data.name: Moment of Clarity
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moment of clarity''''' was a [[divine]] [[abjuration]] [[spell]] that let a [[paladin]] help another creature shake off [[:Category:Mind-affecting spells|mind-affecting spells]] or effects.
document_data.Effect: On casting the spell, the paladin touched another being who was the victim of a mind-affecting spell or other effect and gave them an immediate second chance to break free of it. However, if that spell or effect allow the victim to break free on their own, ''moment of clarity'' could not aid them.
document_data.Components: It was [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s and a [[divine focus]].
